name: 江謝令涵
objective:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed
schedule:
1. Introduction to systematic thinking
2. Climate change & REW nexus
3. System analysis
4. System analysis and policy design
5. Sustainability
6. Examination

name: 林文印
objective:
Change, complexity, uncertainty and conflict are often central in environmental management. They can create opportunities as well as problems for analysts, planners, managers, decision makers and members of the public.
Human activity can contribute to environmental degradation. To be effective analysts, it is important to be able to identify and understand the differing and often conflicting pressures placed on policy makers, and the implications for the intent and output of policies.
schedule:
1 Introduction
2 Characteristics of Environmental Problems
3 Sustainable Development
4 Energy and Environment
5 Green Community
6 Oral Presentations
scorePolicy:
1. Class Participation 40%
2. Homework 20%
3. Term Paper & Presentation 40%
consultation: Please email Professor Lin (wylin@ntut.edu.tw) to discuss or arrange meeting.
remarks: 課程內容可能涉及聯合國 17 項永續發展目標 (SDGs)：目標 6 Clean Water and Sanitation、目標 7 Affordable and Clean Energy、目標 11 Sustainable Cities and Communities、目標 12 Responsible Consumption and Production、目標 13 Climate Action、目標 14 Life Below Water、目標 15 Life on Land。

name: 陳孝行
objective: To produce data with known and defensible qualities in the laboratory
schedule:

Week 4 Quality assurance/Quality control (definition, standard curve, control chart)

Week 6 Examination
